column23: the most recent installment in the famous run-and-gun action shooting series
column24: returns to the battlefield on PlayStation®4 with a plethora of brand new features! In addition to the classic dot-pixel graphics being upscaled to 1080p and additional 4k resolution support
column25: this “remastered” port of METAL SLUG XX is fully functional with DUALSHOCK®4 game controllers
column26: including vibration support to make the heated battle feel even more hectic
column27: and fan-favorite voice samples played through the controller’s speaker during the release of POWs and other in-game events. METAL SLUG XX also offers two different types of scanlines for players who want a true nostalgia trip
column28: as well as newly implemented Trophies for those who love a good challenge! In addition to the six characters found in the original release
column29:
“the silent soldier” Leona Heidern is now playable from the beginning for even more action! MISSION START!
